00040 /**
00041  * @class SnpSummaryEngineTest

00045 class SnpSummaryEngineTest : public CppUnit::TestFixture
00046 {
00047   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(SnpSummaryEngineTest);   
00048   CPPUNIT_TEST ( CheckOptionsTest );
00049   CPPUNIT_TEST( CreateReportFromXMLTest );

00065 // check the options
00066 void SnpSummaryEngineTest::CheckOptionsTest()
00067 {
00068         cout<<endl;
00069         Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("SnpSummaryEngineTest","checkOptionsTest");
00070         SnpSummaryEngine engine;
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(engine.getOptBool("h")==false); 
00072         string a = engine.getOpt("summary-out-file");
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(engine.getOpt("summary-out-file") != "");
00074         string b = engine.getOpt("output-format");
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(engine.getOpt("output-format") != "");
00076 }
00077 
00078 //test calculating metrics with options specified in XML file
00079 void SnpSummaryEngineTest::CreateReportFromXMLTest()
00080 {
00081         cout<<endl;
00082         Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("SnpSummaryEngineTest","addCelTest");      
00083     Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00084     bool caughtException = false;
00085         try
00086         {
00087                 SnpSummaryEngine engine;
00088                 engine.setOpt("xml-file","SnpSummaryTestAddCel.job");
00089                 engine.run();   
00090         }
00091         catch(...)
00092         {
00093         caughtException = true;
00094         }
00095     CPPUNIT_ASSERT (caughtException == false);
00096 }

00098 // test for failure if two different array types are in list of CEL files
00099 void SnpSummaryEngineTest::MixedProbeArrayTypeTest()
00100 {
00101         cout<<endl;
00102         Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("SnpSummaryEngineTest","mixedProbeArrayTypeTest"); 
00103         cout<<"The fatal error below is expected. ('Unable to extract SNP summaries')" << endl;
00104         Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00105         SnpSummaryEngine engine;
00106         engine.setOpt("xml-file","SnpSummaryTestMixProbeArray.job");
00107         NEGATIVE_TEST(engine.run(), Except);
00108 }
00109         
00110 static string ConvertFloatToString(float value)
00111 {
00112         std::stringstream data;
00113         data.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield);
00114         data.precision(8);
00115         data << value; 
00116         return data.str();
00117 }
00118 
00119 // test calculation of metrics
00120 void SnpSummaryEngineTest::SummaryStatsTest()
00121 {
00122         cout<<endl;
00123         Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("SnpSummaryEngineTest","SummaryStatsTest");        
00124         
00125         int nSets = 2;
00126         vector<vector<u_int8_t> > calls(nSets);
00127         vector<vector<float> > metrics(nSets);
00128         for (int iset=0; iset<nSets; iset++)
00129                 calls[iset].resize(2);
00130         calls[0][0] = 6;
00131         calls[0][1] = 7;
00132         calls[1][0] = 8;
00133         calls[1][1] = 11;
00134         for (vector<vector<float> >::iterator metricIt=metrics.begin(); metricIt!=metrics.end(); metricIt++)
00135                 metricIt->resize(6);
00136         SnpSummaryStats stats;
00137         stats.CalculateMetrics(calls, nSets, metrics);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[0][0] == 100.0);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[0][1] == 50.0);
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[0][2] == 0.0);
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[0][3] == 50.0);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[0][4] == 0.50);
00143         string value = ConvertFloatToString(metrics[0][5]);
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(value == "0.15729921");
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[1][0] == 50.0);
00146         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[1][1] == 0.0);
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[1][2] == 50.0);
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[1][3] == 00.0);
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (metrics[1][4] == 0.50);
00150         value = ConvertFloatToString(metrics[1][5]);
00151         CPPUNIT_ASSERT (value == "0.31731051");
00152 }
